title: Hua Xia state-linked Chinese bank tokenizes $600M in yuan bonds
description: Hua Xia Bank, a commercial bank operating in China, has successfully issued $600 million in tokenized yuan-backed bonds to onchain holders.
content: Hua Xia Bank, a publicly traded financial institution linked to Chinas government, issued 4.5 billion yuan ($600 million) in tokenized bonds on Wednesday, aiming to reduce clearing friction by removi… [+2328 chars]
